Text:
I noticed on imdb.com, 

Cyrano De Bergerac (1990, French, cokor) gets a 7.5 star,
 and  Cyrano De Bergerac (1950, US, B&W) also get a 7.5.

  Steve Martin's Roxanne (1987, US. Color) gets a 6.6 points.

Anyone wants to put ther own rating?

Mine is  Jose Ferrer > Steve martin> GĂŠrard Depardieu

Can you upload this movie..
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0099021/

leeSally, I would also add Janeane Garofolo.  The Truth About Cats and Dogs was a clumsy take on the story who's main failing, in my mind, was that I was expected to think Uma Thurman is beautiful. :p

Having trouble getting a Depardieu version with decent subs, but so far I agree Jose Ferrer is untouchable.
Very bad quality! Must be from a very fucked up DVD. The HDTV rip is MUCH better.
The video/sound quality sure takes me back to the 90's.
